title: Take Back Your Attention
description:
"Take Back Your Attention" is a short compilation with clips from several Rebel Wisdom films, and featuring visuals from the recent Netflix film with Tristan Harris, "The Social Dilemma".

Check out the relaunched Rebel Wisdom website: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/

Rebel Wisdom Interviews
Tech vs Human, Douglas Rushkoff: https://youtu.be/koE-ZQia15E
Can Truth Survive Big Tech? Tristan Harris: https://youtu.be/wHQQFOv7QgQ
Hacking Consciousness, Joshua Fields: https://youtu.be/Zscgm1s8qvc
War on Sensemaking V, Daniel Schmachtenberger: https://youtu.be/0v5RiMdSqwk

Videos Used
The Social Dilemma - Netflix  
A Powerful Experiment: https://youtu.be/XJ5zx__Iavs
Armed militia, Black Lives Matter protesters collide in Louisville marches: https://youtu.be/-PLHPmlRcmw
Music - The Sound of the Rain Needs No Translation - Akira the Don: https://youtu.be/hcmz5fEg8ek
Top moments of CHAOS protest George Floyd USA Minneapolis and Minesota: https://youtu.be/goYZm9NZ5ho
Warning, Stop Ignoring the Social Dilemma: https://youtu.be/sIuFVjQX13E

Other Visuals: https://www.thevisualators.com/
